summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4222 for the improvement of the alley in block 5, Hunter's Lake Union Addition, being the alley as platted between Smith Street and Wheeler Street, east of 4th Avenue North, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 50111, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
